text:
@TimMurtaugh @JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump When you consider that @gop spent time and $ trying to prosecute Hillary when 4 people died in Benghazi & Trump screwed up COVID-19 response so bad 78k people have died to date, I think we need Biden just to fix that.
There are many other Trump screw ups Biden would fix!
